articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: India vs Nepal Live Score Women’s Asia Cup T20 2024: IND: 91/0 after 10 overs; Shafali Verma races to fifty, Mandhana steps in as captain - The Indian Express
articles.description: IND Women vs NEP Women Asia Cup T20I 2024 Live Score: After a strong start from Shafali Verma and Dayalan Hemalatha, Jemimah Rodrigues was able to provide finishing touches to the Indian innings.
articles.content: India Women: Shafali Verma, Smriti Mandhana, Dayalan Hemalatha, Harmanpreet Kaur(c), Jemimah Rodrigues, Richa Ghosh(w), Deepti Sharma, Pooja Vastrakar, Radha Yadav, Renuka Thakur Singh, Tanuja Kanwar… [+292 chars]
